unnormalised: Ed-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to a Brighter Future?
normalised: Ed-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to a Brighter Future?

unnormalised: Struggling to fund that dream course at IIT Delhi? Scholarship portals might just be your answer, yaars! These online hubs are becoming increasingly popular, connecting students like Rohan Sharma from Patna with countless opportunities. Think of them as the Shaadi.com for your education funding needs.
normalised: Struggling to fund that dream course at I I T Delhi? Scholarship portals might just be your answer, yaars! These online hubs are becoming increasingly popular, connecting students like Rohan Sharma from Patna with countless opportunities. Think of them as the Shaadi dot com for your education funding needs.

unnormalised: From the Nirav Modi Scholarship (yeah, the irony!) to smaller, niche grants, these portals are listing 'em all. Sites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are leading the charge. They streamline the application process, saving you hours of trawling through individual college websites.
normalised: From the Nirav Modi Scholarship (yeah, the irony!) to smaller, niche grants, these portals are listing 'em all. Sites like Buddy four Study and Vidya Lakshmi are leading the charge. They streamline the application process, saving you hours of trawling through individual college websites.

unnormalised: Just a word of caution – double-check the legitimacy! Some scams lurk, so always cross-verify info with the official university website. Application deadlines are crucial; many close on 31/12/2024. Also, some require applications before 17:00 hrs IST. Don't miss out! It could mean the difference between landing that Rs. 50,000 grant or not. Many new portals are scheduled to launch on 15/08/2024. Good luck, and may the odds be ever in your favor!
